[[module CSS]]

#header h1 a::before { content: "愉快整活" !important; }
#header h2 span::before { content: "不觉得这很酷吗？作为一名理科生我觉得这太酷了" !important; }


[[/module]]


[[module ListUsers users="."]]
[[size x-small]]**%%title%%**：诺维乔克，请帮我查找一下编号为5526785的基金会职员。[[/size]]

[[/module]][[>]]
